description: For a picture-perfect treat to wow your guests, work smarter - not harder. This recipe hacks a Woolworths mud cake to create a show stopping dessert.
name: Easy Chocolate Bark Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Dollar Sweets Gold & Silver Candles

recipeInstructions.text: Break chocolate into large pieces. Press chocolate bark into sides and top of cake to cover. Decorate with cake topper and candles to serve.
